question:
To make a tomato sauce taste more like a pizza sauce,

Choices:
A: mix extra paprika into the sauce to brighten the flavor.
B: mix a little bit of sugar into the sauce to sweeten it.
steps: Pizza sauce typically has a slightly sweet flavor profile.
Tomato sauce can sometimes be more acidic compared to pizza sauce.
Adding a bit of sugar to the tomato sauce will counteract the acidity and create a sweeter taste.
This sweetness will make the tomato sauce more similar to typical pizza sauce.
Therefore, the correct method to make tomato sauce taste more like pizza sauce is to mix a little bit of sugar into the sauce.
